name: WalkTrue
slogan: A Marketing Agency for Places and Spaces

jobs.title: Architectural Unreal Engine 4 Developer (UK Based)
jobs.description:
We're a london-based company (see our website walktrue.co.uk) and we produce virtual places and spaces for a range of clients. There is so much more to say about this company – future plans, scope of the role, the amazing office and culture – but let’s save that for later...

We are looking for a full time developer to help us with our current projects as well as helping us to build the next products in our pipeline.

We're very open-minded, but interest / experience in 

* Developing high-quality, creative games 
* Debug and optimize existing code
* High quality, optimised texturing
* Write robust, maintainable code
* Contribute development ideas
* Deployment to various platforms (Oculus Rift S, Desktop. 360 tours etc)
* Unreal Engine 4

**
What You Need for this Position**
Strong knowledge of Unreal Engine (required)
Understanding of architectural drawings / models (required)
Ideally we are looking for somebody in the London area, but are very open to remote UK workers.
**
What's In It for You**
Competitive salary: £40k+ DOE
Flexible work environment with a dynamic team
Growth opportunities including helping to grow the team
Ability to contribute to development ideas


If you're interested, drop us an email at patrick@walktrue.co.uk
(No agencies please)
